results.question: What is the meaning of green arrow traffic light?
results.choiceOne: Allowing vehicles to go right or left
results.choiceThree: It is prohibited to enter on the direction of the arrow

results.question: Broken yellow line on the road means:
results.choiceOne: It is prohibited to overtake on the left or right side
results.choiceTwo: You are allowed to overtake on the right side
results.choiceThree: You are allowed to overtake on the left side
